actions.text: Amendment SA 4728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4728 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator McCaskill to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3962; text: CR S3962) To require clear and comprehensible disclosure of conditions, exclusions, and other limitations pertaining to flood insurance coverage.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4728 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator McCaskill to Amendment SA 4707.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require clear and comprehensible disclosure of conditions, exclusions, and other limitations pertaining to flood insurance coverage.
